data.title: Former Israeli Prime Minister Yitzhak Shamir Dies at 96
data.meta_description: Shamir, Born 1915, Served in the Mossad and as Speaker of the Knesset and Foreign Minister Before Succeeding Menachem Begin as PM in 1983.
